name: calcium
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Increases Special Attack effort by 10, but won’t increase it beyond 100. Increases happiness by 5/3/2.
short_effect: Raises Special Attack effort and happiness.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Raises the stat SP. ATK of one POKéMON.
flavor_text.emerald: Raises the base SP. ATK stat of one POKéMON.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A nutritious drink for POKéMON. It raises the base SP. ATK stat of one POKéMON.
